summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting a delayed response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to an FBI inquiry. It indicates that records can be obtained through the Interstate Identification Index using NCIC transactions.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: He is listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services, which is the agency responding to the FBI inquiry.

events.title: FBI Inquiry Response
events.description: The New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services provides a delayed response to an FBI inquiry, indicating that records can be obtained through the Interstate Identification Index.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St. Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The document is an FBI 302 form dated October 6, 2021.
It records a delayed response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to an FBI inquiry.
The response indicates that records can be obtained through the Interstate Identification Index (III) using NCIC transactions.
Michael C. Green is identified as the Executive Deputy Commissioner of the responding agency.
